1 /**
  2  * handle attributes for properties
  3  * 
  4  * @namespace
  5  */
  6 var PropertyAttr	= {};
  7 
  8 /**
  9  * Define a property attribute
 10  * 
 11  * @param {Object} baseObject the base object to which the property belong
 12  * @param {String} property   the name of the property
 13  * @return {PropertyAttr}	builder for property attributes
 14  */
 15 PropertyAttr.define	= function(baseObject, property){
 16 	return new PropertyAttr.Builder(baseObject, property);
 17 };
 18 
 19 /**
 20  * Constructor
 21  * 
 22  * @param {Object} baseObject the base object to which the property belong
 23  * @param {String} property   the name of the property
 24  */
 25  PropertyAttr.Builder	= function(baseObject, property){
 26 	// sanity check
 27 	console.assert(typeof(baseObject) === 'object');
 28 	console.assert(typeof(property) === 'string');
 29 	// set local values
 30 	this._baseObject= baseObject;
 31 	this._property	= property; 
 32 }
 33 
 34 // export the class in node.js - if running in node.js
 35 if( typeof(window) === 'undefined' )	module.exports	= PropertyAttr;
 36 
 37 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 38 //		.typeCheck()							//
 39 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 40 
 41 var TypeCheck	= TypeCheck	|| require('../src/typecheck.js')
 42 
 43 /**
 44  * check if this property is of validTypes
 45  * @param  {[type]} types valid types in typecheck.js format
 46  * @return {PropertyAttr.Builder} for chained API
 47  */
 48 PropertyAttr.Builder.prototype.typeCheck	= function(types){
 49 	TypeCheck.setter(this._baseObject, this._property, types);
 50 	return this;	// for chained API;
 51 }
 52 
 53 
 54 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 55 //		.trackUsage()							//
 56 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 57 
 58 var QGetterSetter	= QGetterSetter	|| require('../src/qgettersetter.js');
 59 var Stacktrace		= Stacktrace	|| require('../src/stacktrace.js');
 60 
 61 // create the tracker for .trackUsage
 62 PropertyAttr.usageTracker	= new Stacktrace.Tracker();
 63 
 64 /**
 65  * track where this property is used (getter and setter)
 66  * @param {String|undefined} trackName	optional name for Stacktrace.Tracker. default to originId
 67  * @return {PropertyAttr.Builder} for chained API
 68  */
 69 PropertyAttr.Builder.prototype.trackUsage	= function(trackName){
 70 	var tracker	= PropertyAttr.usageTracker;
 71 	// handle polymorphism
 72 	trackName	= trackName	|| 'PropertyAttr.trackUsage:'+Stacktrace.parse()[1].originId();
 73 	// define getter
 74 	QGetterSetter.defineGetter(this._baseObject, this._property, function(value){
 75 		tracker.record(trackName, 1);
 76 		return value;	// return value unchanged	
 77 	});
 78 	// define setter
 79 	QGetterSetter.defineSetter(this._baseObject, this._property, function(value){
 80 		tracker.record(trackName, 1);
 81 		return value;	// return value unchanged	
 82 	});
 83 	return this;	// for chained API
 84 }
 85 
 86 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 87 //		.privateOf()							//
 88 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 89 
 90 var PrivateForJS	= PrivateForJS	|| require('../src/privateforjs.js');
 91 
 92 /**
 93  * Mark this property as private
 94  * @param  {Function} klass the class to which it is private
 95  * @return {PropertyAttr.Builder} for chained API
 96  */
 97 PropertyAttr.Builder.prototype.private	= function(klass){
 98 	PrivateForJS.privateProperty(klass, this._baseObject, this._property);
 99 	return this;	// for chained API
100 };
101
